typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ORDERID as string,
		CUSTOMERID as string,
		EMPLOYEEID as string,
		ORDERDATE as string,
		REQUIREDDA as string,
		SHIPPEDDAT as string,
		SHIPVIA as string,
		FREIGHT as string,
		SHIPNAME as string,
		SHIPADDRES as string,
		SHIPCITY as string,
		SHIPREGION as string,
		SHIPPOSTAL as string,
		SHIPCOUNTR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
source1 derive(ORDERID = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn1
